content: the stargirl bralette is a simple and super quick bottom-up knit that is completely customizable you can knit it with any yarn and needles and you can make it as long or as cropped as you d like you have the choice to add on embroidered stars at the end this pattern is meant to be a very basic tutorial for knitting this garment shape laying out the steps i took to make this piece you may need to modify slightly to make the bralette that is perfect for you
